description: On a regular afternoon at the Next Door shoot house, something very unusual is about to transpire. Cody Cummings is lounging around the house, taking it easy as usual. Now he's seizing the moment and taking fate in his own hands.He introduces himself and informs Sierra that he knows a quiet, private place to which they can escape together, just for a little while. They soon move to a bench where Cody tastes Sierra up and down, finally sliding his massive cock inside her. Watch Cody pump his new acquaintance using every chiseled muscle in his incredible body. They're fucking in several hot positions, soaking up every bit of dripping, sexual juice. It's a casual, intense secret rendezvous that will blow your mind...and your wad.  Enjoy!
title: Off the Clock
